name: Dog Guardian and the Fallen Star
name_original: Dog Guardian and the Fallen Star
description:
It is said that, a creature from the Heavens has bestowed this small town with the greatest gift.... A Guardian

!!!!!Epilepsy Warning for when you start the game, there is a quick flicker of black and white when you open the game which can possibly cause epilepsy !!!!

Controls

ComputerMobile buttons (has a Gameboy setup)MoveWASD/ Arrow KeysDPad Interact[Z]/[J][A]Cool List[Shift][Select]Jump[Spacebar][B]Start Button[Enter][Start]

Made with GB Studios check it out!!
